fulltext:
Nguyen Van Nam 
SUMMARY 
- 
Have consistently contributed to company’s growth and profitability by combining technical, 
management knowledge and with a dedicated proactive approach. 
- 
Cooperative and able to perform within a team-oriented atmosphere. 
- 
More than 5 years experienced working at web developer. 
- 
More than 2 years remote job Angular/ASP.NET core MVC. 
- 
Can presentation and training. 
- 
Hard working, eager to learn. 
- 
Can work well under pressure. 
- 
Hobbies: information technology, films, games and travel. 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
1.   Frontends: 
- 
HTML/CSS. 
- 
Basic for JavaScript. 
- 
Package manager: npm. 
- 
CSS Pre-processors: SCSS. 
- 
Langulage: TypeScript, Javascript, Dart. 
- 
Framework: Angular, ngrx, RxJS. 
- 
Experiences implement best practice in frontend. 
- 
CSS Framework: Devextreme, Bootstrap, Angular Material, Bulma. 
- 
CSS Architecture: SMACSS, BEM 
- 
Pixel Perfect Frontend Development: Perfect Pixel addon, Ruler, BrowserStack. 
- 
Build tool: Task runner, linters and formatters 
- 
Testing. 
2.   Backend Languages: 
- 
Experience implement ASP.Net Core. 
- 
Experience implement Entityframework. 
- 
Experience implement IdentityServer4, Implements with Google, Facebook service provider 
authentication. 
- 
Experience implement databases like MS SQL Server, Mysql, Postgres, MongoDB. 
- 
Experience used with Nodejs, Express, TypeORM 
- 
Experience used with TDD for Automation test (use Gherkin). 
3.   Others 
- 
HTTP/HTTPS and API. 
- 
SOLID, CQRS. 
- 
Sercurity Code 
- 
Git version. 
2/5 
- 
Work with scrum, Jira tools. 
EDUCATION & CERTIFICATIONS. 
- 
2009 – 2014, Software engineering – Vietnam Agricultural Institute – Vietnam. 
- 
2014, Intern, Web Application Developer in Techmaster Vietnam 
PROJECTS 
1. July 2015 – July 2016 
Web Developer 
Customer: Viet Nam 
Role: Web Developer 
Project Description: 
- 
Develop the company’s products for healthcare, portal application. 
Team size: 5 peoples 
Responsibilities: 
- 
Define structure object model 
- 
Define solution for project 
- 
Coding 
- 
Report Design 
- 
Break down user stories into tasks 
- 
Enhance performance of application 
- 
Testing. 
Technologies Used: 
- 
Hardware environment: PC – Sam sung 21 inch 
- 
Software environment: Windows 7 
- 
Development tools: Visual studio 2013, Nodepad++, subline text 3, Visio. 
- 
Programming language: C#, Javascript, .NET Framework - MVC4, Bootstrap 3 
2. July 2016 – May 2017 
Role: Web developer 
Customer: Viet Nam 
Role: Fullstack Web developer 
Project Description: 
- 
Develop the opensource's products 
Team size: 5 peoples 
Responsibilities: 
3/5 
- 
Coding/Development 
- 
Review Code 
- 
Backup database 
- 
Deploy application 
- 
Break down user stories into tasks 
- 
Enhance performance of application 
Technologies Used: 
- 
Hardware environment: PC, Laptop 
- 
Software environment: Windows 10, Ubuntu, GIT, Bitbucket 
- 
Development tools: Visual studio 2015, Nodepad++, subline text 3, baqsomid, paint.net. 
- 
Programming language: C#, Javascript, php. 
- 
Framework: ASP.NET MVC, Bootstrap 3, AngularJS, Wordpress, Jquery 
3. May 2017 – May 2019 
Fullstack Web developer ASP.NET 
Project 1: Aventis 
Customer: Switzerland 
Role: Fullstack Web developer 
Description: 
- 
Migration Application from Window Application into Web Application. 
Team size: 10 people 
Responsibilities: 
- 
Coding. 
- 
Research and Build Architecture project. 
- 
Review Code. 
- 
Unit Test. 
- 
Automation UI test 
- 
Break down user stories into tasks 
- 
Enhance performance of application 
- 
Support team member. 
- 
CI/CD Developer plan. 
- 
Onsite. 
Technologies Used: 
- 
Hardware environment: PC, Laptop 
- 
Software environment: Windows 10, Ubuntu 
- 
Development tools: Visual studio 2015, VSTS team services, Jira, Confurenc, GIT, GITLAB, MS 
SQL Server. 
- 
Programming language: C#, Javascript, Typescript. 
- 
Framework: .NET Core 2.0, Bootstrap, Angular5+, Selenium, Docker composer, Devextreme. 
Entityframework, Dapper, Gherkin, WebDAV. 
Project 2: Application Portal 
Customer: Switzerland 
4/5 
Role: Fullstack Web developer 
Description: 
- 
Used .Net Core 2.0 to develop portal for intranet system, includes PinNet.Chat, PinNet.Portal, 
PinNet.Admin 
Team size:  3 people 
Responsibilities: 
- 
Coding 
-

- 
Unit Test 
- 
Break down user stories into tasks 
- 
Enhance performance of application 
- 
Refactor for quality code 
Technologies Used: 
- 
Hardware environment: PC, Laptop 
- 
Software environment: Windows 10 
- 
Development tools: Visual studio 2015, VSTS team services, GIT, SQL Lite. 
- 
Programming language: C#, Javascript. 
- 
Framework: .NET Core 2.0, Bootstrap, Jquery, Entityframework, Gherkin, WebDAV, WebRTC, 
Websocket. 
Project 3: Rethink Calendar 
Customer: Switzerland 
Role: Fullstack Web developer 
Description: 
- 
Develop Web Application Rethink like google calendar.

Responsibilities: 
- 
Developer.

May 2019 – 1/10/2019 
Senior Frontend Developer 
5/5 
Customer: Sysmex, KPMG 
Role: Senior Frontend Developer 
Responsibilities: 
- 
Developer 
- 
Review code. 
- 
Support for member. 
- 
Unit test 
- 
Build framework structure for project. 
- 
Training technical angular for member

-

- 
Software environment: Window 10, Jira, Confurence. 
- 
Development tools: Visual code studio, Postgres, npm, NodeJS, CLI, etc.
